variants.Description in input context: m.4390A>G, leading to the p.Ser11Arg alteration in ND6 subunit of complex I

Additional Mutation Information.description: Other point mutations affecting mitochondrial genome-encoded subunits (ND) can result in structural and functional defects in complex I. These mutations may predispose patients with PINK1 mutations to impaired responses to mitochondrial stress, contributing to dopaminergic neuron degeneration.
